profile:
Unlike many other radiant providers, Radiant Sole is proud to focus exclusively on in-floor hydronic radiant floor heating systems.

At Radiant Sole, we pride ourselves on our work ethic and the quality of our work. The entire rough-in stage, which consists of insulating the space with R-11 insulation and running grade-A PEX pipes, is typically completed in a single day. With Radiant Sole, you can be certain that you are getting an unparalleled level of quality at a surprisingly affordable price.

We look forward to hearing more about your project. In many cases we can suggest ideas that lead to the most efficient layout, in-turn lowering the overall cost of the system.

Give us a call or send us an email and we'll be in touch right away! Thanks for visiting our page.

More Information about Radiant Sole:

Our team has years of experience designing and installing beautiful hydronic radiant floor heating systems in the GTA. We quickly and efficiently install everything from basement systems to more complex systems including heating of the upper levels of your home. We take great pride in delivering a high quality, beautiful finished product.

Straightforward process:

We use extremely high-quality R-11 insulation and grade-A PEX pipe for the first step of the project, the rough-in. Our insulation doesn’t require messy wire mesh, leaving behind a clean, flat surface ready for the concrete slab. As soon as a heat source is installed, we return to assemble the manifold - the brain behind the system. This is what we call the hookup. You have the option of setting multiple temperature zones with separate thermostats controlling each zone.
specialities: Snowmelting systems and hydronic heating systems
name: Radiant Sole   Radiant Floor Heating Experts

profile:
About Us
Air Care Quality Comfort Inc. is a family-owned and operated HVAC company. We specialize in furnaces, air conditioners and hot water tank installation, repair and maintenance. We pride ourselves in providing you with excellent, knowledgeable and friendly service.
We take our responsibility very seriously when you place your trust in us. All of our technicians are certified, knowledgeable and trained to the industry standards as well as going above and beyond to ensure our customer's satisfaction. Our entire company works hard to make your experience with us hassle-free.

It is important to fix problems immediately before they cause damage, that’s why we offer emergency service 24 hours a day. Let our professional, friendly and experienced staff be there when you need us the most.

profile:
UniAire Home Comfort is a family-owned with over 25 years of experience in the heating & cooling business and serving residential and commercial customers in the GTA.

 
UniAire is proud of itself on its commitment to extraordinary customer service and experience in heating and cooling systems.
 

UniAire is trying to give feeling to the customers that you will be always as part of the UniAire family when you are dealing with us.


UniAire has comprehensive experience with even the most ancient of old boiler systems to help customers to repair existing boiler with part and labour warranty or replace it with a neat, tidy and wall-mounted unit (condensing unit) or design, install, extend an in-floor heating systems for your property.


UniAire also specializes in a new home or remodeling ones to design, install in duct working and all HVAC equipment and even help customers to finance your project with significant government rebate and low-interest financing available now. now is an excellent time to replace your HVAC equipment and convert your homes' energy source to high efficient ones and make an investment with fast return.

profile:
JCJ Mechanical Contractors Inc. is your full service HVAC contractor Servicing Commercial and Residential offering sales, service and installation of Air Conditioning & Heating units in Toronto, Brampton, Mississauga, Newmarket and the GTA. We welcome the opportunity of providing you with sound advice and quality products and service.
We specialize in: Air Conditioning, Heating and Indoor Air Quality.

 

We know that heating and cooling system problems may occur at any time, so we are always available to assist you, 24 hours a day, weekends and during holidays.

We believe that the quality time you will be spending with your family will greatly improve if you have comfortable air temperature in your homes.

You can count on us for prompt, cost-effective and long lasting air conditioning & heating services for your home or office, anytime in Toronto or the GTA.

Call us for consultation and free estimates. Our licensed heating and cooling system specialists are available to answer your queries and be there for you each step of the way.

We are your one-stop-shop for all your heating and cooling needs providing preventative maintenance to home owners to large commercial properties and industry.

profile:
Welcome to H and R Services, one of the finest HVAC installation and maintenance services contractors in Greater Toronto Area. Our top priority is to provide homeowners a quality residential High efficiency furnaces, boilers, water heaters, air conditionings Heat pumps and indoor air quality with our innovative and very economical HVAC solution. Our service areas cover Toronto, Mississauga, Hamilton, Oakville, Scarborough, Thornhill, Richmondhill, Burlington, Brampton and others areas of GTA. 

Toronto Special High Efficiency Furnace Services

H and R services offers 24/7 furnace installation and preventative furnace maintenance and diagnoses services. We have seen a big change in winter season from last couple of years. Home furnace has become most important appliance that helps us to stay warm in winter season. We offer high efficiency furnaces at an affordable price range. Our furnace brands are Goodman and AIRE-FLO. Our technicians are professionally trained to do maintenance of other furnace brands including Lennox furnaces, Amana furnaces, Rheem furnaces, Trane furnaces and other GTA's common furnace brands. 

We have highly trained experienced and dedicated HVAC professionals to provide you reliable installation and maintenance of High efficiency furnace at reasonable price. 

Toronto Special Central Air conditioning and ductless Air conditioning services

We offer quality cooling product's installation and services for both central and ductless air conditioning systems. Our air conditioning installation product brands are Goodman and AIRE-FLO. We also provide maintenance services of other air conditioner brands included Lennox, Amana, Rheem, Goodman and LG. Our 24/7 support system is always ready to assist you. We have professionally trained air conditioning technicians with latest equipment for installation. In addition, our technician are trained to provide you diagnose and repair services of central air conditioner and split air conditioner.

profile: Woodbridge GTA ClimateCare has been providing heating and cooling solutions to the Greater Toronto Area for over 40 years. At Woodbridge ClimateCare, you and your home will get the respect you deserve from the moment we arrive, on time that is. We offer same day service, quality products, competitive prices, and licensed service technicians who are not only experts in heating and cooling solutions, but customer service as well! We realize that your furnace and air conditioner can break at any time of the day, which is why we offer 24 hour service, all day, every day!

profile:
Fully Licensed to Proudly Service Your Home or Business
in the GTA
Visic Bros Heating & Air Conditioning Ltd specializes in residential and commercial heating and air conditioning A/C. Our specialists have served the Greater Toronto Area since 1966 and we stand behind our reputation on every job we perform.

Family owned and operated, we at the company pride ourselves on our ability to offer competitive rates, top-level professionalism while on the job and a genuine respect for your property. We are perfectionists, love what we do and are happy to provide service within 24 hours notice, rain, shine or snow.

RESIDENTIAL :
Our specialists are fully licensed to install and service gas furnaces, central and ductless air conditioners, Unico systems, ductless A/C, gas water heaters, gas boilers, gas fireplaces, and other home comfort accessories such as electronic air cleaners and humidifiers. We also install gas pipes and hook up your natural gas appliances such as barbeques, dryers and stoves. We offer "Peace Of Mind" Protection Plans and work within your budget. 
Visic Bros. offers the complete line of commercial boilers, rooftop split units, unit heaters and radiant heat systems.
COMMERCIAL:
We deal with only the very best brands and our installation track record provides you with a trusted source to have your equipment properly configured.

Our specialists are fully licensed to install and service gas furnaces, central and ductless air conditioners, Unico systems, ductless A/C, gas water heaters, gas boilers, gas fireplaces, and other home comfort accessories such as electronic air cleaners and humidifiers. profile:
ALLIN AIR was founded in the year 2008 by a group of hvac contractors. The goal was simple: to provide superior furnace repair and air conditioning services while being cost competitive. Our growth has been tremendous ever since we started.

We have four main service areas; these areas consist of Brampton, Vaughan, Toronto, and Mississauga. With different service areas across Toronto, we can provide quick and reliable emergency repair services. When customers call us, they know they are getting contractors who are well seasoned in the business. Through being in the business for many years, we have seen it all; HVAC contractors that promise to show up but never come, or contractors that don’t properly repair the problem.

We are different. We want you to be 100% satisfied with our service, speed and price. Our commitment to excellence and dedication to our clients is the reason we are in the position we are today. You can rely on us to take care of all your furnace and AC repair needs. Call us now for a speedy and reliable service.

Contact us at 647-272-7050 or 1855-225-4328

profile:
At GTAHeat.ca Inc. we specialize in residential and commercial installations of hydronic snow melt and floor heating systems.
We organize and coordinate between all trades relevant to the installation, can cover everything from gas, plumbing, concrete and Agilasilica overpours, landscaping and HVAC. We are your one stop solution provider and can generate certified and stamped mechanical designs, heat loss calculations and loop layouts, supplemental heating and air conditioning. We also provide fully licensed residential/commercial plumbing and HVAC work. With us as the single point contact there is no need for you to coordinate between trades and solve scheduling conflicts. You give us the directions and we provide you with a turn-key installation.


Absolutely Guaranteed - No Questions asked warranty

Canadian Hydronics Council Certified designs and installation services.

Residential and commercial radiant floor heating, snow melt, space heaters, air handlers, radiators and pool heater installations.
Whole house floor heating or just a basement?
No job is too small or too big for us.
All systems tailored to your needs and budget.
Anywhere you need to heat we can do it with hydronic systems.


Design Services:
BCIN stamped residential heat loss calculations.
Detailed radiant heating boiler room designs and drawings.
BCIN Stamped loop-layout drawings for building permits.
Auditing of existing hydronic heating systems with written report of design and installation deficiencies.
In our FREE Quote you will find a detailed list of parts and components based on our hydronic designs and products for your project.

Please take a look at our FREE quotes form on https://GTAHeat.ca/quote-request
Check out our Portfolio: https://www.gtaheat.ca/portfolio-item

If you have any questions, don't hesitate to contact us! Tel: 647 688 2669 Email: info@gtaheat.ca

Many references available.

Follow us on Instagram! @gtaheat.ca


Thank you for visiting,

GTAHeat.ca Inc.


Working from Niagara to Kingston and Cottage Country. Like Oakville, Burlington, Mississauga, Niagara Falls, Stoney Creek,
Vaughan, Richmond Hill, New Market, Barrie, Aurora, Caledon, Milton, Brantford, Hamilton, Cambridge, Kitchener, Guelph, Brampton, Toronto, Scarborough, Uxbridge, Aurora, Pickering, Oshawa and surroundings.

The Top Furnace, Air Conditioning, Heating and Cooling Contractors in Toronto
M & M Heating and Cooling Company, the most experienced and trustworthy HVAC Company in Toronto. With more than 30 years of combined expertise in the industry among our staff members allows us to provide our customers with the best service experience possible, offering smart heating and cooling solutions for both residential and commercial spaces. Our main goal is to ensure that the tradition of customer satisfaction lives on today, and we achieve this through our reliable and highly trained staff. One of the best local HVAC Company Toronto.

M & M Heating & Cooling was founded in 2005. Proudly combining 30 years of experience M & M Heating and Cooling has evolved into one of the most stable and dependable service companies.

Our people is our greatest strength. Here at M & M Heating & Cooling, we pride ourselves on high-quality workmanship, exceptional service, and trustworthiness. All members of our technical teams are properly certified, factory trained and well-experienced. Our customer service representatives possess the necessary technical expertise and equipment knowledge and are always ready to answer your questions over the phone.

M & M Heating & Cooling is proud of our tradition of excellence serving homeowners and business in GTA. Our mission is to provide our customers with the best service experience possible and we achieve this through our reliable and highly trained staff in our Heating and Cooling Company Toronto.

profile:
AT CONSULT MECHANICAL CUSTOMER SERVICE IS OUR COMMITMENT

No matter how large or small the project, we will work with our clients from the beginning, through budgeting and planning phase, design, installation, and completion. Upon completion of all projects we then grow our relationship with our clients and offer them planned maintenance and service to ensure that their new Comfort system is operating as effectively and efficiently for years to come.

We understand that choosing the right contractor is a big decision and this is why we greatly appreciate the opportunity in serving all of our clients. We are known to work with our clients, and going the extra mile is our standard. Our installation division is a team of qualified and continually trained technicians that pride themselves in offering the highest level of customer satisfaction.

profile:
Incepted in 2004, My Home Comfort aims at offering home owners enduring comfort and peace of mind through worry-free HVAC installations, repairs and maintenance.

With a wide spectrum of air conditioners, water heaters, furnaces and humidifiers that stand for superior quality, we provide our customers with extensive solutions to meet their specific cooling, heating, air and water treatment needs.

What make our offerings more suitable and desirable are our financing programs that are designed to assist customers economically with their HVAC installation, maintenance and repairs.
services:
Air Conditioning
Replace, repair and maintain your cooling system with the assistance of experienced and trained technicians. Also, you can seek knowledgeable advice of our experts to find an ideal solution for your residential or commercial air conditioning needs.

Furnaces
Create a warm and comfy environment in your home in the cold winter season with the installation of a functional heating system. Ensure year-round comfort with our regular maintenance packages or repair the existing system to operate at peak efficiency.

Water Heaters
Keep your household functional with continuous supply of hot water through our same-day water heater installation and replacement service. With all our professionals certified and trained in HVAC systems and maintenance, you can rest assured that your project is in safe hands.

Humidifiers
Whether you seek regular servicing or professional installation, our in-house team of engineers can maintain and service all makes and models of humidification systems with minimal inconvenience and maximum satisfaction.

Thermostats
While air conditioners, furnaces, humidifiers and water heaters are a common source of home comfort, thermostats have an essential role to play when it comes to operating these systems.

A thermostat activates or deactivates cooling and heating systems to control the temperature within the home. However, the functionality of thermostats varies from model to model and choosing the right can help you save a lot of energy and money on utility bills.

Gas Lines
When it comes to gas line installations and repairs, quality and safety remains inevitable. We specialise in safe gas line repair and replacement and are committed to fast service, fair pricing and 24/7 support.

In addition, all our products and services are backed by limited warranties that guarantee complete satisfaction and peace of mind. We also offer different financing options for our customers to fulfill their HVAC needs without breaking the bank.

profile:
If you are seeking a service-driven, highly qualified team of HVAC professionals to install and maintain you’re heating and air-conditioning equipment, then Nu-Air Mechanical Limited will be of interest to you.
Nu-Air Mechanical has been in the service business for 10 + years and one of our best measures of success is our impressive roster of repeat customers. We have worked hard to meet our customers’ expectations and we will always continue to do so. Our technicians are all highly qualified with training experience and have a commitment to provide consistent quality standards and have best value to all our customers. Our service and reliability are second to none.

profile:
AZ Comfort Air is a Mississauga residential and commercial heating & cooling service company.
With 35 years of combined experience in the HVAC industry, our extremely knowledgeable staff can install, service, and maintain your home gas furnace, air conditioner or water heater as well as we service commercial air system backed with a premium five-year parts and labor warranty that is almost exclusive to AZ Comfort Air. Our history stands behind us.

We service and maintain all other major name heating and cooling systems to satisfy the needs of our Mississauga home owners. We work with both residential and commercial HVAC systems. We can service any brand name, guaranteed. Call us for a FREE estimate for a new gas furnace or air conditioner installation.

When required, subcontract work to a licensed professional for Refrigeration.

profile:
AP Heating and Technical Services Inc. is a heating, ventilation, and air conditioning company located in Toronto, Canada. We provide sales, installation and service of heating and cooling products for homes and businesses in Southern Ontario.
AP Heating And Air Conditioning is the authorized dealer of many worldwide respected companies such as ,Keep Rite, Goodman, payne® , aire-flo and others. Fully licensed and well-experienced technicians always perform the highest quality of work and are available in emergency all around the clock all year long.

AP Heating & Technical Services Inc,. always offered lower prices than competitors in order to satisfy even low income customers. If you haven’t found the product you were looking for in our catalog, please call us and will try to ensure that it will be available in the shortest terms.

profile:
Comfort Air Mechanical Services has been providing installation and maintenance to HVAC equipment for over 25 years of service experience. At Comfort Air Mechanical Services we want you to be COMFORTABLE all at an affordable price!

Free Estimates Available
We install, service, and provide maintenance on all makes and models. If you are interested in having a unit installed in your home, please leave us a request message. We'll set up a convenient date for your home inspection and let you know exactly what you need. Thanks!

Call NOW and take advantage of these offers!
-  10% off your first service INCLUDING labor and parts!
-  FREE digital thermostat with every furnace installation!
-  0% interest on replacement furnaces and A/C,s  with 6 equal payments  upon approved credit!
-  FREE 10 YEAR parts & labor on all Furnace and A/C packages (conditions may apply)
-  Rebates up to $250 available on many units…call us for details!

(Certain conditions apply to all offers…call for details)

Our team specializes in the installation and service of all types of heating, ventilation, air conditioning and hot water systems. We take pride in our company by providing you with complete satisfaction.

We offer our customers trustworthy installation, maintenance, tune ups and inspection services to all makes and models of HVAC equipment that will insure your equipment runs reliably and efficiently.

This will help save money with your utility costs. Ask us today about our Annual Protection Plan Package! Our service technicians will maintain your system year-round to ensure it turns out properly and efficiently.

profile:
The Canadian climate certainly isn’t kind to your HVAC system. During the harsh winter months, frigid temperatures ensure your furnace or boiler is operating at its maximum limits to keep you warm. When summer comes around, the heat has you blasting cool air consistently throughout your home. All of that takes its toll, and eventually, you could be left with an HVAC system that fails at an inopportune time. Ensure that doesn’t happen by giving Precision HVAC Mechanics Inc a call today!

Whether you’re looking to install a new air conditioner or repair an older furnace, we’re equipped to provide HVAC services in Brampton. Bought a new air conditioner after your old one gave out? Let us take the installation off your hands! Are you left shivering in your home due to your boiler malfunctioning? Handling the problem yourself may only make matters worse. Licensed and insured, we’re able to safely and efficiently solve your heating crisis.

Commercial HVAC Service
Looking to add a new rooftop unit to your business? Need a heating or cooling unit for your construction site? We offer commercial HVAC services, too! Keep your clients comfortable in your building with a regularly-maintained HVAC system. We’re also able to provide an energy assessment for your business, giving you an expert recommendation to help you save on your next energy bill.

Don’t wait until your HVAC system fails. We’re open 7 days a week, so give us a call today to let us keep your system running smoothly!

profile: With 40 years of experience in the Heating and Air arena, our qualified technicians are equipped with both expertise and professionalism. Ber-Cool offers Service Maintenance Contracts for both Commercial and Residential clients and 24 hour Service Support line. Installation is conducted through our installation division Ber-Cool Ltd. Our areas of expertise include: Gas / Propane / Oil Forced-Air Heating/Cooling and Boilers, Gas Lines, Radiant in-floor heating, Tankless and Traditional Hot Water Tanks, Walk-In Refrigeration, Air Filtration, Energy and Heat Recovery Ventilators. For more information visit us online at www.bercool.com.

profile:
TEMPRTECH is a full service HVAC/R contractor (heating, ventilation, air-conditioning and refrigeration) serving the commercial, institutional, industrial, and Residential markets in Kuwait

Complete HVAC/R system design, repair, and installation energy management & indoor air quality services comprehensive preventative maintenance packages to keep your systems at peak performance and reliability. 

On-call emergency repair service and support 24/7, 365 days of the year. Extended warranty available on installations and equipment
 
PREVENTATIVE MAINTENANCE
we repair all types and brands of HVAC equipment to prevent breakdowns and equipment failures through preventative maintenance programs.

QUALIFIED TECHNICIANS
We use only experienced, licensed, and certified HVAC service technicians and we are a company you can rely on to maintain and service your HVAC/R and other systems with professionalism, integrity, and reliability.

ENERGY EFFICIENCY SAVINGS
We also offer a full range of energy management services. Let TEMPR Tech help you increase your energy efficiency and control costs while keeping your home or company staff comfortable all year round.

Free Consultation: Energy Management and HVAC Audit
We can recommend ways for you to maximize your energy efficiency and reduce your energy usage as well as show you the cost benefits of preventative maintenance. We can demonstrate your savings in consultation. Call us at   + (965) 677-15988    to set up an appointment.

Improve comfort and air quality - Improve work environment - Improve system reliability

Reduce equipment downtime - Reduce total cost of ownership - Reduce operating and energy costs
 
UP-FRONT PRICING
We believe in treating customers like intelligent people. So there are no hidden costs. You will always receive a true estimate of the costs, a fair price, and the best possible job.

profile:
Residential:

Doganli Mechanical provides a long range of Heating, Ventilation and Air Conditioning products. With the option of retrofitting your exiting unit with a more efficient and cost effective unit. Our Ontario certified technicians will ensure the proper and safe installation of all products. Dognali Mechanical also provides warranties on all installations and products at no extra cost. We sell, lease and finance all HVAC products.


 CENTRAL AIR CONDITIONING
    FURNACE
    BOILERS
    DUCTLESS A/C
    HOT WATER TANKS
    HUMIDIFIERS

Commercial:

    HEAT PUMPS
    ROOF TOPS
    RECIPROCATING CHILLERS
    BOILERS

profile:
Air Comfort is a family owned business operating in the GTA for 30 years. 
We are licensed and insured contractors. We service, maintain and install all makes of furnace, air conditioners, and hot water products. This includes humidifier issue, tankless water heaters, ductless heat pumps, and rooftop units. We serve not only  residential homes but also commerical and industrial properties.
We pride ourselves on customer satisfaction. 

Your comfort is our business
